p: Relative frequency of citations reveals the importance of each grass among indigenous communities of Punjab, ethno-veterinary medicines and primary health care of animals to make them healthy and productive. It is calculated from the citation frequency of informants claiming the use of a plant species divided by the total number of informants who participated in the survey to share their indigenous knowledge [ 5]. In our work, RFC ranges 0.96 to 0.14 ( Table 2).
